channel.title: Foreign - EP by anechoik
channel.description:
hello, auxy community,
today, a new release of mine just dropped. the haus. after my album “cloud” released, i immediately started to work on new, fresh, experimental projects. im proud of this 6 track masterpiece. it is also my first ever EP.
the EP is available for stream and purchase on all platforms!
[Apple Music ](https://music.apple.com/us/album/foreign-ep/1472732264) [Spotify ](https://open.spotify.com/album/2slRvtKwAJA2AXjuHnQXnx?si=oIcb_XKLQGmfGvr0DY4N0Q)
